scripts.start: npm run copy-library && npm run serve
scripts.copy-library: npx --yes shx rm -rf node_modules/@cap-js-community/feature-toggle-library && npx --yes shx mkdir -p node_modules/@cap-js-community/feature-toggle-library && npx --yes shx cp -R ../package.json ../index.cds ../cds-plugin.js ../src node_modules/@cap-js-community/feature-toggle-library
scripts.upgrade: npm up --save && npx --yes shx rm -rf node_modules && npm i
